A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
"All" men characters behave like idiots\, all women strong and brave
We don't sacrifice ourselves for the greater good anymore\, unless you're a strong woman
Rules of space don't apply to this movie\, gravity and inertia.(Burning fuel at max speed)
Established rules of the SW saga don't apply to this movie. (Hyperjump kamikaze)
The rules of the force is changed\, no dark side or light side users. (Yoda force lightning)
Rey goes from being a nobody to the most powerful force user in SW universe without any training of the force.
No villain has any significant impact in the movie.
Main characters in this movie has no development and is really insignificant.
Previous movies to this movie is now insignificant to the saga continuum.

-Kathleen Kennedy and Rian Johnson\, may the great Sarlacc feast on your bones for thousands of years for destroying the greatest saga ever told on movie media! This is a shameful destruction of a legacy handed down to you from the one of the greatest artists since J.R.R Tolkien\, George Lucas. Fk you and your feminism bullshit!
